title: RRA interactions — rra_interactions
text: cellchat_obj path file generated 'format_cellchat()' liana_obj path file generated 'format_liana()' cell2cell_obj path file generated 'format_cell2cell()' cpdb_obj path file generated 'format_cpdb()' sample_id sample id use saving object output_dir output directory saving output (default = '.') n_perm number permutations create pval_dummy variable computing -log10(pval_dummy) * score, applicable CellChat, Cell2Cell CellPhoneDB

title: Run CellChat — run_cellchat
text: Run CellChat

title: Run CellChat — run_cellchat
code: run_cellchat(   gene_expr,   annot,   interactions_db,   output_dir = ".",   min_cells = 5,   n_perm = 1000 )

title: Run CellChat — run_cellchat
text: gene_expr seurat object gene expression (rds file) annot Column metadata containing cell type labels interactions_db (custom) CellChat database output_dir output directory saving output (default = '.') min_cells Minimum number cells required cell group cell-cell communication (default = 5) n_perm Number permutations permutation testing (default = 1000)

title: Run CellChat — run_liana
text: Run CellChat

title: Run CellChat — run_liana
code: run_liana(   gene_expr,   interactions_db,   annot,   output_dir = ".",   min_cells = 5,   min_pct = 0.1,   n_perm = 1000 )

title: Run CellChat — run_liana
text: gene_expr seurat object gene expression (rds file) interactions_db (custom) CellChat database (rds file) annot Column metadata containing cell type labels output_dir output directory saving output (default = '.') min_cells Minimum number cells required cell group cell-cell communication (default = 5) min_pct Minimum fraction cells expressing gene (default = 0.1 = 10%), max = 1 n_perm Number permutations permutation testing (default = 1000)

text: interactions_agg_integration path '402c_filtering_aggregated_res.rds' condition_var Variabile containing 'condition' (group/category) samples (default = "Condition_dummy") alpha significance threshold filtering p-values (default = 0.05) output_dir output directory saving output (default = '.') output_name name output file (default = "interactions_summary")
